text: Fugget About It is an adult animated sitcom. It was created by Nicholas Tabarrok and Willem Wennekers for Teletoon's late night block, Teletoon at Night. It is rated 14A for sexuality, violence, and profanity, which makes it the first and so far only adult-oriented project by 9 Story Media Group. The show was created from the Pilot Project contest on Teletoon. The show premiered in the United States exclusively on Hulu on October 13, 2013. title: Fugget About It
